post.summary: Retrieve all projects matching specified filter conditions
post.description:
Filters are cumulative (AND logic), applied in the following order: by Region, by Status, by URN, by School, by
Delivery Officer.

parameters.name: urn
parameters.description: URN of a specific project to retrieve

requestBody.description: Dfe.Academies.Academisation.Data.ProjectAggregate.GetAcademyConversionSearchModel describing filtering requirements for the request

200.description: One or more projects matching the specified filter criteria were found

404.description: No projects matched the specified search criteria

get.summary: Returns a list of statuses and assigned users available to be used in filters
get.description: Statuses or users not in use in the current project data will not be present in the returned data

200.description: details of available filter parameters are provided

get.summary: Returns the project with the specified id.

200.description: The project with the specified ID was found and returned

404.description: The project with the specified ID was not found

patch.summary: Updates the project with the specified id using the provided partial data in projectUpdate

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the project to update

requestBody.description: The partial data describing the changes

200.description: The update was applied successfully and the updated project is returned

400.description: The request failed validation and the errors are returned

404.description: The Project with the specified ID was not found

post.summary: Adds a note to the project with the specified ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID for the project to which the note should be added

404.description: The ID does not correspond to a known Project

201.description: The note has been added to the specified Project

delete.summary: Deletes the provided note from the project with the specified ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID for the project from which the note should be deleted

204.description: The note has been deleted from the project

404.description:
Either the project with the specified ID is not found, or the project does not contain the
provided note

requestBody.description: The model holding the data required to create an Involuntary conversion
